translation: "Om Tat Sat": This has been declared to be the triple designation of Brahman. By that, the Brahmanas, the Vedas, and the sacrifices were created formerly.
commentary: 17.23 Tatsat Om Tat Sat? It is thus? Instruction: designation? Brahmanaḥ of Brahman? Threefold threefold? remembered has been declared? Brahmanas Brahmanas? by that by that? Vedas Vedas? f and? Yajnaḥ sacrifices? f and? prescribed created? Pura formerly.Commentary Om Tat Sat is the root of the entire universe. Om is the Akshara Brahman. Tat means That? the indefinable. Sat means Reality.For Brahman? that Supreme
